programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep876
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep21
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: Player in Kaohsiung (M) Ep2930
programme.desc:
The name “Kaohsiung” has entered into a century of history since it has been renamed from “Da Gou”. This year, the National Day fireworks will be held again in Kaohsiung after 20 years passed. SETI has specially produced a new travelogue for Kaohsiung, leading the audience to visit the most popular, charming, and unique places in Kaohsiung. Through the lens, the century-old glory of Kaohsiung’s [One-Hundred] is presented profoundly.
The new season of "Player in Kaohsiung" invites many hosts and celebrities, including Yao Yao, Chang Chin Lan, Daniel Chen, David Wu, Ada Chang, Fay Wu, and Kua Kua, visit the 38 administrative districts of Kaohsiung to explore the sensational stories of the people in the alleys, deeply explore the professional spirit of the Greater Kaohsiung area, the traditions and customs of the aboriginal people, the living beside the farms and ports, and the humanism nurtured by Kaohsiung’s century-old history.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep414
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Hello Again! (M) Ep2526
programme.desc: Just 100 days left until the college entrance examination. Chang Ke-Ai, a top student, and Yang Zih-Hao, a renowned prankster, the twelve-graders make a wager in school one day after a squabble. In a twist of fate, the wager turns out to alter the courses of their lives.

programme.title: Love · Revolution
programme.desc: Ai Yoshida will do anything for love, including traveling to Thailand with her boyfriend from Japan to run dope. When her boyfriend is kidnapped by the local gangster after a brawl at a bar, Ai sets out on a rescue mission that sends her on an action-packed roller-coaster ride where she meets a professional assassin who breaks out of jail for love.

programme.title: The Sinking City Capsule Odyssey
programme.desc: A group of people living in ‘space capsules’ – large seminar rooms subdivided into small living quarters - struggle to fight for their ideal way of life in the prosperous yet divided city of Hong Kong.

programme.title: Fatal Visit
programme.desc: Yanny leaves Hong Kong for San Jose to visit her old friend Ling. Ling and her husband Tang seems to live an ideal and carefree life. However, during her five-day stay, Yanny uncovers the truth behind the façade as she reveals the unspeakable secrets that will propel all three down a fatal path of destruction.

programme.title: Wine War
programme.desc: A Chinese wine expert residing in France is contacted by his childhood buddy in China to help him bid for a famous bottle of vintage wine in an auction. Little did he realize he is about to enter an age-old feud between rivaling vineyards and discover a historical mystery that might shatter the whole wine industry.

programme.title: Fall in Love at First Kiss
programme.desc: In this romantic love story starring Taiwanese actors Darren Wang and Jelly Lin, an ordinary girl develops a stubborn crush on the school genius after an unexpected kiss. But with the genius adored by everyone in the school, can their relationship blossom and develop?

programme.title: Quan Dao: The Journey of a Boxer
programme.desc: Ah Niu learns boxing from Uncle Xing, the boss of a boxing studio, since young and uses his skills to help the weak fight villains. When Xing’s son attempts drug trafficking to save his father’s studio but fails and is brutally beaten up, Ah Niu accepts a death combat challenge so as to help him take revenge.

programme.title: Aberdeen
programme.desc: The Cheng family embodies a microcosm of Hong Kong, with its contradictions between tradition and modernity, superstition and materialism, family and individual. The movie reveals troubled characters dealing with their own issues in the city, from the eldest, Taoist priest patriarch Dong; to the youngest, the bullied elementary schooler Chloe.

programme.title: The Sleep Curse
programme.desc: During the Japanese occupation of Hong Kong, a young translator colluded with the enemy and was cursed by a murdered comfort woman. Forty five years later, the translator's son who is a professor specializing in sleeping disorder does not believe in the sleep curse on his father and tries to dispel it with a horrifying sleep experiment.

programme.title: Hello Mr. Billionaire
programme.desc: An incompetent soccer goalkeeper for a minor league suddenly inherits thirty billion yuan in this mind-boggling comedy. In order to get the full amount, he must first spend one billion yuan on himself in a month without telling anyone about the task, and is also not allowed to own any assets at the end of it.

programme.title: Days of Being Wild
programme.desc: Yuddy is an orphan who is callous towards any women who falls for him. One day, Yuddy sets out on a fateful journey to Philippines to meet with his mother, but the trip ended up disheartening him again.

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: Programmer and gamer Hao Ming gets approached by mercenary Fei Qiao and businessman Takeshi, and is drawn into a shady hacking game in Malaysia. The cyber mission quickly turns dangerous as Hao Ming must navigate the hidden motives and dealings of the mercenaries and figure out who's behind it all.

programme.title: Duckweed
programme.desc: An emotional story about the reconciliation between a father and his son. Ah Lang, a young car racer from a small town, thinks that his father never understood his occupation and life. In a fateful occurrence, he is able to experience his father's legendary and interesting life in the past.

programme.title: Nightfall
programme.desc: Detective George Lam investigates the brutal death of a Sino-British conductor and suspects he is murdered by Wong Yuen Yeung, a dumb killer who has just been released from prison. When out on a manhunt for Wong, Lam finds more revelations to the contrary and has to pursue every possibility, taking him deep into Wong’s past.

programme.title: A Nail Clipper Romance
programme.desc: An amateur surfer, who has been through several bad relationships, meets a kind-hearted tattoo artist. Everything is perfect until she confesses that she is an unusual “nail clipper monster”. With such a claim, can their love settle their differences?

programme.title: Kung Fu Yoga
programme.desc: Jack, a renowned archaeology professor, and his team are on a quest to locate a lost ancient Indian treasure. They find a diamond key unlocking the treasure, but it is snatched by a team of mercenaries. Jack leads his team to India and Dubai to beat the mercenaries to the treasure.

programme.title: Love for Life
programme.desc: Set in a small Chinese village, where an illicit trade in human blood has resulted in the spread of HIV, De Yi and Qin Qin are two fellow AIDS sufferers who unexpectedly fall in love with each other and risk everything to pursue a last chance at happiness...

programme.title: Schemes in Antiques
programme.desc: Despite his family’s expertise in ancient Chinese relics, Xu Yuan becomes an electronics shop owner to distance himself from his disgraced family. However, when an antique is to be returned to China, Xu Yuan uncovers an ancient mystery and soon embarks on a journey that can finally restore his family’s reputation but may also cost him his life.

programme.title: True Legend
programme.desc: Su Can was once a top general but choose to return to his hometown to study martial arts and enjoy family time with his wife and son. However, his wife was killed and the family became victims of conspiracies. Su was heartbroken and wandered like a beggar with his son. One day, he met the "God of Martial Arts" and learnt Drunken Fist from him.

programme.title: A Simple Life
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is based on a true story. Ah Tao works as a maid for Roger’s family for four generations. After they emigrated, she stays only to work for Roger, but is forced to retire and move into an elderly home after she suffered a stroke. Since then, Roger becomes her caregiver as Ah Tao starts adapting to a new life.

programme.title: That Demon Within
programme.desc: A dutiful police Dave, saves the life of a gang leader, Lin. When Lin commits another crime, Dave regrets his action and suffers from a severe mental disorder at the same time. He becomes a fugitive wanted for murder and tries to destroy Lin and his gang so as to restore his reputation as a good police officer.

programme.title: Integrity
programme.desc: Anti-corruption senior officer Chen lines up a key witness, corporate accountant Jack, to testify against a tobacco trading company CEO for bribing high-level customs officer as well as smuggling contraband cigarettes. When neither Jack nor the CEO shows up on the day of the hearing, Chen must team up with his ex-wife to launch an investigation.

programme.title: I Love You, You're Perfect, Now Change!
programme.desc: Catch this comedy-musical adapted from the Broadway classic I LOVE YOU, YOU’RE PERFECT, NOW CHANGE – consisting of 12 independent stories from the viewpoints of individuals, families and societies all exploring the timeless theme of love!

programme.title: The Story Of My Son
programme.desc: Li attempts to make a fortune at the horse-racing tracks, but is subsequently entangled with loan sharks. Li becomes debt-laden while his sons are harassed by debt collectors, when more heart-wrenching events begin to unfold.

programme.title: Princess & 7 Kung Fu Masters
programme.desc: During the early years of the Republic era, in the North-East region of China, the people are suffering from the power struggle among the local Warlords, bandits, and Japanese invaders. Warlord Lam (Sammo Hung), is not a leader of great vision, but stands firm in his own beliefs. The only paradise within the region is 'Lucky Town', the one place where no one dared to attack as it was protected by the seven kung fu masters who have resided there. When young patriots, Yan Fang (Rose Chan) who disguised herself as a man, and Howard Luo (Dennis To), infiltrate Tiger's Den at night trying to steal the code book fail in their mission and tries to run, only Yan survives and is rescued by Cheryl. Mistaking Yan as a man, Cheryl falls for Yan. She then brings Yan to Lucky Town and begs the Seven Masters to cure Yan. Cheryl and the Seven Masters are then told of the secret plan by the Japanese, and together, they resolve to fight against Tiger Den and save Warlord Lam.

programme.title: Night and Fog
programme.desc: Following “The Way We Are”, this is based on a true story happening in Tin Shui Wai. It revolves around an older, unemployed Hong Kong man, his young Mainland wife and their two daughters. Their lives, unfortunately, are anything but easy, and the shocking conclusion raises issues about the plight of the socially deprived lower class.

programme.title: Meow
programme.desc: Earth has always been home to the aliens called Meow since ancient times. This species has now transformed into ordinary cats living among humans all over the world. Xi Xi Li is the last Meow who comes to Earth with the intention of invading it. However, his plan gets derailed when a family in Hong Kong takes him in as a pet.

programme.title: Railroad Tigers
programme.desc: Set in the Second Sino-Japanese War, a railroad worker, Ma Yuan, leads a team of guerilla fighters and forms the “Railroad Tigers” to steal supplies from the Japanese army for the poor. Unarmed and outnumbered, they must rely on their wits to fight against an entire army.

programme.title: A Beautiful Moment
programme.desc: An ageing bachelor finally meets the girl of his dreams and proposes marriage, only to discover her psychologist stepmom was his first love long ago. The future in-laws initially pretend not to know each other but as the wedding date gets nearer, the rekindling of long-dormant feelings develops into a cross-generational love triangle.

programme.title: Fearless
programme.desc: This movie is inspired by the true story of real-life hero Huo Yuan Jia. When a fight destroys the reputation of this renowned martial arts champion along with the lives of his family, Huo’s path to redemption brings him face-to-face with the most ferocious opponents in the world.

programme.title: Think Big Big
programme.desc: Moon is a plus-sized girl working happily as a mascot at a theme park. That is until one day she accidentally joins a weight loss competition, with her remarkable transformation turning her into the "Nation’s Goddess". Netizens have their eyes glued on her, turning her life upside down, and Moon has to find a way to be happy again.

programme.title: Concerto of the Bully
programme.desc: The story follows an internet songwriter Jamie, who is gifted with an extraordinary retentive memory. One day, she was kidnapped by Yung, a street punk, to a remote fish raft. In the hope to flee with the only ability she has, Jamie offers to give Yung a spiritual music therapy. The two who have nothing in common begin to form a bond through music.

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 2
programme.desc: In this sequel, Zhang Wu Ji successfully rescued the Six Major sects at Dadu. Nevertheless, the quest for the Dragon Sabre continues as Wu Ji and his three girlfriends set sail for Ice Fire Island. After a series of vicious fights, they finally unveil the secret behind the Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre.

programme.title: Journey Of The Doomed
programme.desc: Journey Of The Doomed stars Tung Wei as a knight that finds himself protecting the life of a beautiful young lady, the lost Emperor's daughter and stalked by a bunch of assassins headed by kung fu actress extraordinaire Hui Ying-Hung.

programme.title: Torrent Of Desire
programme.desc: Rich playboy David is a drunk until he falls in love with a fashion model Dan Feng and marries her. David's sister Mona is in love with his best friend Han Ming, who rejected her as he secretly loves Dan Feng as well. Out of jealousy and hatred, Mona lies to David about a fake affair between Han Ming and Dan Feng...

programme.title: The Sword Stained With Royal Blood
programme.desc: Adapted from the novel by Jin Yong, havoc breaks out when a warrior on the run uncovers a sword, training manual, treasure map & a secret message on the body of a deceased martial arts master.

programme.title: Crazy Shaolin Disciples
programme.desc: Three young kung-fu warriors from wildly different backgrounds become students of Shaolin at the same temple. These three warriors are: Royal Guard Lo Lieh, fleeing soldier, Lo Meng, and villager, Wang Yu.

programme.title: My Rebellious Son
programme.desc: The venerated Sun Chung made many different kinds of films for Shaw Brothers, including popular and renowned satirical comedies, contemporary action dramas, and magnificent martial arts movies. This is one of his last of the latter for the studio, so he wanted to have fun... and let the audience share it. Toward that end he cast international favorite Alexander Fu Sheng as the title character who keeps testing the patience (and kung-fu skills) of his father, a small town bonesetter and herbal healer played by award-winning character actor Ku Feng. But when a local dignitary not only smuggles drugs but plans to give a Chinese treasure away to evil outsiders, the father and son unite to take on foreign fighters and even Japanese ninja in a non-stop display of comic action prowess.

programme.title: Tragic Commitment
programme.desc: When the husband of a doctor, Tung is fatally wounded in an accident, he reveals to her about his affair with Blackie, who is impregnated with his baby. Despite the devastation of the betrayal and the eventual death of her husband, Tung is pressured by her mother-in-law into putting up with Blackie and offer $1M for her baby...

programme.title: Opium And The Kung-Fu Master
programme.desc: Tie Qiao San, head of the Ten Guangdong Tigers, is an honourable master with many disciples. As opium becomes popular among the nobles, Tie starts taking it and gradually harms his body. When an opium house’s owner defeats Tie in a fight and he is only saved from being killed by his disciple, Tie vows to quit opium and get back on his feet.

programme.title: Empress Wu
programme.desc: Wu Ze Tian is a beautiful and talented concubine of Emperor Tang at age 14. She becomes a nun after he died but has two sons with the new Emperor Tang Gao Zong. The Empress asks Wu to team up with her against Consort Xiao, but is set up and dethroned by Wu, who also kills her two sons. After the Emperor’s death, Wu becomes the first woman Emperor.

programme.title: The Lady Assassin
programme.desc: Ambitious Prince Four (Liu Yung) attempts to kill the potential heir Prince Fourteen (Mok Siu-chung), but the latter is rescued by his aide Tseng Tsing (Hsu Shao-chiang). After an unsuccessful attempt to buy Tseng Tsing, Prince Four tries to murder him, but fails. He eventually hires Nien Keng-yao (Pai Piao), an outstanding martial artist, as his aide.

programme.title: Human Lanterns
programme.desc: Zhao was once defeated by Long in a duel. 7 years later, however, Long asks Zhao to make a unique lantern on his behalf for winning the lantern contest. At the same time, Zhao plans for revenge. One day, after Long’s wife suddenly disappeared, Long hears about the story of human lantern, leading him to suspect Zhao may involve in the incident…

programme.title: The Knight Of Knights
programme.desc: Wen Su Chen, the leader of seven knights, sends his six sworn brothers to investigate a monastery. Unfortunately, they are killed by an abbot who plans to murder Inspector Lin. Wen saved Lin and battles the abbot to avenge his dead sworn brothers. With Lin and his army’s help, they bring down the ruthless monks in the monastery.

programme.title: The Pearl Phoenix
programme.desc: In Huangmei Opera tradition, this movie tells the love story of Wen, who sells himself as a slave to a rich family, and Huo, the family’s young daughter. The lovers are kept apart by Huo’s stepmother and Huo escapes by dressing up as a man. Wen is framed and put into jail so Huo has to go back and rescue her lover!

programme.title: The Pure And The Evil
programme.desc: Two teen girls, Rose and May, become close friends despite their different social backgrounds. The rich girl May moves to America but returns years later to see Rose, now a beauty queen and bar girl. Rose is immediately attracted to Fang’s fiancé and their relationship quickly deteriorates when Rose sets out to pursue him…

programme.title: House Of Traps
programme.desc: It all started with THE FIVE VENOMS, the internationally loved kung-fu thriller which introduced director Chang Cheh's recurring cast of martial arts masters. It continued through more than a dozen high-flying, bloody good entertainments featuring the same action actors in pairs, trios, quartets, and, most memorably, quintets. While this is considered the last official "Venoms" movie, what a film it is. The title does not lie: an evil prince has secreted stolen imperial treasures in a building that practically bristles with booby-trapped blades. Bodies are pierced, limbs are cut off, and there's one plasma-spurting attack after another as heroes and rogues alike try to solve the secrets of the hell house. The core Venoms themselves choreograph the gory fun in this fond farewell to their worldwide film series sensation.

programme.title: The Mad Monk
programme.desc: The Mad Monk lends a helping hand to the villagers and teaches all the bad guys a lesson they won't forget. A fun Caper with an underlying moral directed by Li Han-hsiang.

programme.title: The Deadly Duo
programme.desc: The prince of the Sung Dynasty is captured by the Chin invaders and is guarded by top martial arts masters. It is up to two powerful patriots to fight the overwhelming odds and pull off the impossible: to rescue the royal Prince and get out of the Chin stronghold alive.

programme.title: The Story Of Sue San
programme.desc: TIn this Huangmei Opera romance, Wang is the son of a respected government official whereas Sue San is a famous prostitute. Although they love each other and seem to be perfectly matched, the two are worlds apart when it comes to social ranking, which will prove hard to overcome...

programme.title: The Hidden Power Of Dragon Sabre
programme.desc: Defeated villain Sung Ching Shu returns and starts a reign of terror, trapping a beautiful Mongolian Princess and mastering the "yin and yang combination" to become almost invincible. Only two swords held by two great swordsmen can stand in his way!

programme.title: The Venus' Tear Diamond
programme.desc: Directed by Japanese director Inoue Umetsugu, Lily Ho and Ling Yun are two master thieves battling for brawn and brain; racing against each other for the famous and most prestigious gem in the world, The Venus' Tear Diamond. It is a delightful musical extravaganza of diamond and romance that is well-presented.

programme.title: The Silent Swordsman
programme.desc: This is adapted from Louis Cha’s “The Book and the Sword”. A young swordsman is tasked to lead a patriotic secret society to fight the traitorous general who colludes with the enemy. At the same time, he encounters a female warrior and two beautiful princesses, and is caught between all their affections for him.

programme.title: Pale Passion
programme.desc: Fa is an obsessive man who loves his wife Ah Hsia but is easily jealous and abuses her. When she leaves him one day, Fa hooks up with another woman, Hsing. A deadly triangle develops when Fa runs into Ah Hsia again and decides to win her back…

programme.title: The Kid With A Tattoo
programme.desc: Young Bao Tong witnesses the brutal murder of his kung fu master by a vicious villain. A large eagle tattoo on Bao’s chest was spotted by the killer as he escapes. Can Bao escape from the killer?

programme.title: Illicit Desire
programme.desc: This instant cult classic adapts three erotic and mystical tales from the Chinese classical works, with stories spanning across time from the Tang to Ming dynasties. The stories, filled with characters such as emperors, concubines, monks and fortune-tellers, intertwine in a world of adultery, lust and greed, alongside great costumes!

programme.title: Lady Of The Law
programme.desc: Chan, the chief of Wan Sheng Escort, is forced to raise his opponent’s son, Yim. While Chan forbids Yim to practice martial arts, Yim secretly learns it. Ten years later, a rapist appears and Yim is arrested by a lady constable as the suspect. The rapist turns out to be Chan’s elder son and Yim is framed by the Chans. Can Yim prove his innocence?

programme.title: Fangs Of The Cobra
programme.desc: Incredibly, the title serpent is not a harbinger of horror, but actually the film's hero. This virtuous viper sniffs out bombs, fights gangs, battles a baby-killing rodent and even takes on a duplicitous woman. This one-of-a-kind thriller will be applauded by reptile fans everywhere.

programme.title: The Dancing Millionairess
programme.desc: The Dancing Millionaires is of the most enjoyable musicals to grace the Hong Kong screens, starring husband & wife team Peter Chen Ho and Betty Loh Ti presenting some extraordinary performances.

programme.title: The Treasure Hunters
programme.desc: Fans of the international star Alexander Fu Sheng were aghast. Their idol had broken both his legs and was recuperating. Everyone wondered: would he be able to return to the action comedies for which he was so famous? This movie was the answer, and it left no doubt that he had made a full recovery. Liu Chia-yung, brother of preeminent martial arts moviemaker Liu Chia-liang, was famous in his own right for kung-fu comedies, and he out-did himself with this one. Imagine Bob Hope and Bing Crosby with the skills of Jet Li and Jackie Chan, and you’ve got an idea of the fun and fury inherent in this delightful tale of two con men vying for a horde of hidden gold. Add to the mix a Shaolin monk (played by "Master Killer" Gordon Liu Chia-hui), a powerfully brutal villain (Wang Lung-wei), and his equally dangerous mute sister (future director Yang Tsing-tsing), and you’ve got one of the most internationally loved kung-fu capers ever made.

programme.title: Tiger Killer
programme.desc: After killing a tiger with his bare hands when drunk, Wu Song is appointed as chief constable. The wife of his brother Wu Da Lang seduces Wu Song but gets rejected and later engages in an affair with a rich man. They poison Wu Da Lang after he finds out about their affair. To avenge his brother’s death, Wu Song kills the two of them.

programme.title: The Shadow Boxer
programme.desc: Skilled shadow Tai Chi boxer Ku Ting hides his skills by working as a construction worker. However, when the thugs assaulted his girlfriend, Ku Ting has no choice but to use his kung fu to show his enemies what it takes to keep justice in line.

programme.title: Twinkle Twinkle Little Star
programme.desc: An actress has information on a crime syndicate and assassins are sent after her. Ricky and Swordflower are to stay undercover at the actress’ house to capture the assassins. When three assassins eventually turn up at a recreation building, Muscle and Ricky arrive in the nick of time for the showdown.

programme.title: The Thundering Sword
programme.desc: Two disciples, Yu and Zheng, are sent by their master to track down the invincible weapon “Thundering Sword” to prevent villains from getting it. Yu encounters the daughter of a ruthless clan, Chiao, who is on her way to seek for the sword. They quickly fall for each other, but when Chiao accidentally injures Zheng, things become complicated.

programme.title: Whose Baby Is In The Classroom?
programme.desc: Chen, a male teacher in an all girls’ high school, is stuck with a baby that isn’t his and must take care of it. As he lives on the school grounds, the baby is a source of constant distraction and worry! Luckily, his class warms to the baby and helps him take care of it while he works his charm on Li Ching, an uptight teacher in the same school.

programme.title: The Big Sting
programme.desc: Three buddies find a rare artifact known as the Double-Faced God but are poisoned by Lady Wu who steals the treasure from them. Before they die, they get their wives to promise to train their children to take back what is rightfully theirs. These kids grow up to exact a vengeance that turns out to be more hilarious than horrific in this comedy.

programme.title: The Warlord
programme.desc: A bandit became a warlord in the northern China by helping Russia fight against Japan. Because of his ignorance and silly behaviour, he was seen as a joke to the people. The warlord was finally killed by the daughter of a troupe master whom he had killed for no reason.

programme.title: Golden Swallow
programme.desc: A heroine finds herself in a love triangle with a swordsman and a warrior. They team up to conquer the evil forces of the martial arts world. However, she is caught between both men whom she admires when facing a deadly duel.

programme.title: Salim
programme.desc: Salim, a doctor, runs into trouble for being too generous towards his patients. Soon, his patience with the justice system snaps and he takes the law into his own hands.

programme.title: Enai Nokki Paayum Thotta
programme.desc: Lovers Raghu and Lekha are torn apart by Lekha's guardian, Kuberan, who forces her to act in films. Years later, Raghu receives a call from her informing him about his estranged brother.

programme.title: Ka Pe Ranasingam
programme.desc: The story is about politics surrounding land and the plight of farmers. It showed Vijay helping poor farmers in their fight against the industries that have acquired their lands.

programme.title: Danny
programme.desc: After the police inspector Kunthavai picks up a complex murder case for investigation, she takes the help of Danny, a smart police dog, to unearth a gang of dangerous criminals involved in serial killing.

programme.title: Maraindhu Irundhu Paarkum Marma Enna
programme.desc: A group of chain snatchers hatch an elaborate plan to carry out their operation. They target women and children but must ensure that they do not get caught.

programme.title: Pyaar Prema Kaadhal
programme.desc: Sree Kumar, a young man, falls in love with Sindhuja, a vivacious woman. However, complications soon arise and they part their separate ways only to reunite again.

programme.title: Taana
programme.desc: A life struggle of a man who's trying to become a policeman as his family members wish and forced him to become police and save their village.

programme.title: Freeticket
programme.desc: The host presents a comprehensive compilation of songs and snippets from some of the most popular and trending Tamil movies.

programme.title: Kavan
programme.desc: A TV journalist goes against the orders of his corrupt and dishonest boss and helps a group of youngsters in their fight against a pesticide factory.

programme.title: Porr Adaikalam
programme.desc: Zee Tamil Movie

programme.title: Lakshmi
programme.desc: Lakshmi dreams of winning a national level dance competition but is scared to participate as her mother despises dancing. However, things take a turn when she meets Krishna, a cafe owner.

programme.title: Kaviya Thalaivan (Legend)
programme.desc: Two rival artists at Sivadas Swamigal's drama troupe compete in everything they do. While one of them goes on to become successful, the other fails in life.

programme.title: Kalavani Mapillai
programme.desc: In order to marry the love of his life, Deva tries to hide the fact that he cannot drive a vehicle from his future mother-in-law.

programme.title: Gorilla
programme.desc: Jeeva, Sathish, Venkat and Sadhik join hands in order to rob a bank with a chimpanzee as their accomplice. However, things do not go the way they planned.

programme.title: Ko 2
programme.desc: When Kumaran, an ordinary citizen, abducts the chief minister of the state of Tamil Nadu, the whole nation wonders what could have compelled a seemingly innocent man to adopt such a drastic step.

programme.title: Mom
programme.desc: Mom is a story of a mother who avenges injustice done to her daughter, in her own unique way. Starring Sridevi, Akshay Khanna & Nawazuddin Siddiqui. (2017)

programme.title: Chennai Palani Mars
programme.desc: An aspiring scientist and a musician, who are cocaine-addicts, attempt to travel to Mars with the help of a scientifically unstable concept.

programme.title: Freeticket
programme.desc: The host presents a comprehensive compilation of songs and snippets from some of the most popular and trending Tamil movies.

programme.title: Pattathu Yaanai
programme.desc: Saravanan and his friends come to Trichy to set up a new restaurant business. However, their plans get interrupted when he gets an order from a local gangster but falls for his girlfriend, Aishwarya.

programme.title: Arasangam
programme.desc: Arivarasu goes to Canada to search for his missing brother-in-law. However, he discovers a plot by terrorists to kill all intellectuals in India and stop the country's growth.

programme.title: Kodiveeran
programme.desc: Kodiveeran, who enjoys a god-like stature in his village, sets out to protect his family as he battles Villangam and Adhigaaram, who pose a threat to his brother-in-law's life.

programme.title: Idhu Kadhirvelan Kadhal
programme.desc: Kathir, who hates marriage, is in Coimbatore to resolve a family dispute. There, he falls for Pavithra but his heart is broken when he discovers that she is in love with someone else.

programme.title: Kanni Raasi
programme.desc: Gemini, a young man, is averse to love and relationships. However, when Anjali, a teacher, moves in next door, she falls for him and tries to change his mind.

programme.title: Kamali From Nadukaveri
programme.desc: Kamali, a young woman, strives hard to land a seat in a prestigious educational institute. Her journey soon inspires others from her small village to follow in her footsteps.

programme.desc: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma

programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.title: Fida
programme.desc: Jai falls in love with Neha, unaware of her and her boyfriend Vikram's evil intentions. He easily gets trapped in their conspiracy but decides to exact revenge while being on the run from the police.

programme.title: Zindagi Ek Sangharsh
programme.desc: When the lives of five individuals living in different places intersect, it results in the transformation of their persona and purpose.

programme.title: Naqaab - Disguised Intentions
programme.desc: Sophia is engaged to millionaire Karan who is completely in love with her. However, when she meets her true love, Vicky, and starts seeing him secretly, her relationship with Karan suffers.

programme.title: Khooni Jung
programme.desc: Shiv Kashi's father puts their family name in jeopardy through nasty tactics. When Shiv finds out about his crimes, he struggles to restore his family's honour.

programme.title: Feet Up With The Stars
programme.desc: The host interacts with celebrities about their work and personal life. Meanwhile, the guests also reveal certain secrets about themselves and indulge in gossip.

programme.title: Dil Ka Rishta
programme.desc: Jai, a multimillionaire, is secretly in love with Tia whose husband he kills unintentionally while driving. After she loses her memory in the accident, she eventually falls for a guilt-ridden Jai.

programme.title: Auzaar
programme.desc: Suraj, a CBI officer, learns that his friend Yash and his father run an illegal business. He is assigned the task to investigate Yash but he decides to convince Yash to mend his ways.

programme.title: Judwaa
programme.desc: Twin brothers Raja and Prem Malhotra get separated at birth but are reunited by fate to defeat Ratanlal, a local gangster, who wants to destroy the Malhotra family.

programme.title: Lailaa O Lailaa
programme.desc: Jai, special investigative agent, falls in love with Anjali and marries her. When he struggles to get hold of Victor Rana, a terrorist on the loose, he asks his wife for her help.

programme.title: Romeo. Akbar. Walter.
programme.desc: A bank cashier, Romeo, is recruited by India's intelligence agency for espionage in Pakistan. However, he finds himself in challenging situations when his cover gets blown.

programme.title: ACP Shiva
programme.desc: Shivakumar, a dishonest cop, ensures that he is transferred to Chennai, where he exploits his position for financial gain. He also supports GK, a local MP, against the commissioner of Chennai.

programme.title: Albela
programme.desc: Tony, a tour guide, falls in love with one of his clients, Sonia, and tries to woo her. However, Sonia does not reciprocate his feelings since she is in love with another man.

programme.title: Kabhi Haan Kabhi Naa

programme.title: Aakhri Yudh

programme.title: Har Dil Jo Pyar Karega
programme.desc: Raj saves Pooja from an accident but she goes into a coma. She eventually recovers and falls for Raj who, by now, has fallen for her best friend Jahnvi.

programme.title: Deewane Huye Paagal
programme.desc: After witnessing a murder committed by a gangster, Tanya flees to Dubai. Karan, who loves her, goes after her only to realise that she is pursued by a few more suitors and the gangster himself.

programme.title: Drona
programme.desc: Aditya is an orphaned and lonely young man. He soon learns that he belongs to a family of ancestral warriors who guard a mystic source of cosmic energy, and he must now take up his responsibilities.

programme.title: Ki & Ka
programme.desc: Kia, an ambitious woman, marries Kabir, a man who prefers the role of a house husband. They enjoy their unconventional relationship until challenges including ego clashes and jealousy set in.

programme.title: Asoka
programme.desc: Asoka, the heir to the Maurya Empire, is sent on an exile for having fought with his half-brother, Susima. While travelling south, he meets Kaurwaki, princess of Kalinga, and falls for her.

programme.title: Pyaar Ka Punchnama 2
programme.desc: Anshul, Siddharth and Tarun each fall in love at the same time with different women. However, their relationships soon turn toxic and make them realise the dark side of love.

programme.title: Aa Dekhen Zara
programme.desc: Photographer Ray Acharya, who has not seen much of success considering his potential, inherits a magical camera from his grandfather that transforms his life completely.

programme.title: Achanak
programme.desc: Arjun and his wife go on the run after she gets accused of murdering his brother. They must prove her innocence while trying to evade the police as well as the real criminals.

programme.title: Mumbai Delhi Mumbai
programme.desc: Pia travels to Delhi to meet a prospective groom whom she is determined to turn down. However, fate plays a tricky game on her when she meets her soulmate in the very city that she dreads visiting.

programme.title: Yeh Lamhe Judaai Ke
programme.desc: Dushant, an aspiring singer, is encouraged by Jaya to achieve his dreams. However, after Dushant becomes successful, his other friends try to create misunderstandings between him and Jaya.

programme.title: Sangdil Sanam
programme.desc: Kishan and Sanam are engaged as children but are separated when his father is accused of a robbery. Later, a grown-up Kishan sets out to claim Sanam as his bride unaware that she is a changed person.

programme.title: Primal Fear
programme.desc: A high-profile lawyer chooses to defend an Appalachian boy accused of murdering an Archbishop. Closer examination of the facts reveal dark secrets about the Archbishop, and the boy's past.

programme.title: The Bounty

programme.title: Bloodsport

programme.title: The Saint
programme.desc: Another Simon Templar adventure. Emma Russell, a young scientist has discovered a secret that will enable the Russian billionaire Ivan Tretiak to crown himself the first Czar of the new Russian Empire, and he will do anything to neutralize the danger she represents. The normally cold and cynical Templar, stirred by long dormant feelings, desperately fights to protect Emma while struggling to master the one identity he cannot assume with ease--himself.

programme.title: Ignorance Is Bliss
programme.desc: Ernesto and Filippo are two polar opposite, rival teachers: one is old-fashioned and straight-laced while the other is free and spontaneous. When they’re issued a challenge to fit into the shoes of the other, a series of hilarious misadventures befall them.

programme.title: Murder by the Lake - The Soul Circle
programme.desc: Two detectives find a newborn baby in a basket on Lake Constance, with a mysterious message, and whose mother, Rita Hafner, was presumed murdered 6 months ago. Two detectives must investigate mysterious symbols and dark legends in order to save her.

programme.title: Murder Up North: Sievers And The Sleepless Nights
programme.desc: Jen Hansen’s death seems by all accounts to be the tragic result of a deadly robbery. However, Sievers suspects that there is foul play afoot as his investigation unearths the skeletons in the pilot’s closet involving his brother and lover.

programme.title: Three Little Pigs
programme.desc: 5-year old Denise is chosen to represent the class in a Chinese storytelling Competition. She struggles to find ways and means to make sure she excels in the competition. Unfortunately, it turns out that another classmate is taking over her place.

programme.title: A Summer in Oxford
programme.desc: Historian Nina returns to her alma mater Oxford to deliver a series of summer lectures. Soon, she finds herself caught in the crossfire of the affections of two men: one, her former advisor and old love interest and the other, a down-to-earth plumber.

programme.title: Commitment Asli
programme.desc: Asli is a young mother struggling to reconcile her commitments as a mother and wife with her professional career. She hires Gulnihal, a nanny and a fellow mother, but whose arrival forces Asli to confront the secrets she has been avoiding.

programme.title: The Grump
programme.desc: After a bad fall, a grumpy old farmer is forced to move to the city to live with his meek son and domineering daughter-in-law. He ends up squabbling with her and the house becomes a chaotic hellhole. Yet, with time, the family becomes closer than ever.

programme.title: Brother's Keeper
programme.desc: Yusuf’s best friend, Memo falls gravely ill. Isolated in their boarding school located in the snowy mountains, tensions run high as Yusuf’s calls for help for Memo becomes increasingly difficult in the face of an authoritarian and bureaucratic system.

programme.title: Hacker
programme.desc: Benjamin is a 13-year-old orphan and hacking enthusiast. One day, he discovers that, contrary to what he was told, his mother didn’t die in an accident years ago. In his conquest to locate her, he provokes the ire of the Danish Secret Service.

programme.title: Ignorance Is Bliss

programme.title: A Summer in Oxford

programme.title: Inspector Coliandro: Special Match
programme.desc: In an attempt to help his good friend, Gamberini, with his gambling addiction, Inspector Coliandro infiltrates a clandestine gambling group. However, in doing so, he misses out on another of his case assignments and ends up endangering both their lives.

programme.title: Meet The Wangs
programme.desc: In this hilarious tale of one-upmanship, a German family discovers that their new Chinese neighbours are better than them at everything from school to work to sports. Jealousy soon escalates to full-blown rivalry and then an all-out war.

programme.title: Nanny On Board: In Mauritius
programme.desc: Henni is 60 years old, fun-loving and strong-willed. However, burdened with financial woes, she decides to be a nanny despite her lack of experience. Soon, she lands her first job offer from Waldner, a widowed father with two daughters, in Mauritius.

programme.title: Commitment Asli
programme.desc: Asli is a young mother struggling to reconcile her commitments as a mother and wife with her professional career. She hires Gulnihal, a nanny and a fellow mother, but whose arrival forces Asli to confront the secrets she has been avoiding.

programme.title: When We Leave
programme.desc: German-born Umay flees a toxic marriage in Istanbul and takes her young son with her to Berlin. There, her conservative family rejects her return and she escapes again to protect her son. This is Umay’s journey of self-determination against all odds.

programme.title: Italian Gigolo
programme.desc: Filippo is the hottest male escort. Incredibly sexy, he makes up in looks for what he lacks in wits. When an accident causes him to undergo plastic surgery, he wakes up to find himself in a new body, with a new face and a new kind of beauty.

programme.title: Copy Cat
programme.desc: A rookie and veteran detective work together on the case of a murdered young journalist. They quickly arrest a prime suspect who seems all but surely the killer. Yet, the ease of everything unsettles them – something isn’t right but what exactly?

programme.title: The Furlough
programme.desc: Four inmates with vastly different convictions are granted a 48 hours furlough. Some seek to redeem failed relationships while others search for vengeance. But above it all, each of them seeks to reclaim their dignity and lust for life once again.

programme.title: Inspector Coliandro: Mortal Club
programme.desc: In this black comedy, Inspector Coliandro discovers a series of gladiator-esque fights that involve fighters who are systematically drugged and manipulated. His sidekick for this case is Veena, a beautiful fighter who was herself once part of the system.

programme.title: Inspector Coliandro: Special Match
programme.desc: In an attempt to help his good friend, Gamberini, with his gambling addiction, Inspector Coliandro infiltrates a clandestine gambling group. However, in doing so, he misses out on another of his case assignments and ends up endangering both their lives.

programme.title: When We Leave
programme.desc: German-born Umay flees a toxic marriage in Istanbul and takes her young son with her to Berlin. There, her conservative family rejects her return and she escapes again to protect her son. This is Umay’s journey of self-determination against all odds.

programme.title: Inspector Coliandro: The Team
programme.desc: When Coliandro is invited to join the “Team”, an elite group of super officers, he readily agrees. However, he soon finds himself sucked into a ruthless system that eerily resembles that of the White Uno Gang, one of Italy’s most infamous criminal group.

programme.title: Italian Gigolo
programme.desc: Filippo is the hottest male escort. Incredibly sexy, he makes up in looks for what he lacks in wits. When an accident causes him to undergo plastic surgery, he wakes up to find himself in a new body, with a new face and a new kind of beauty.

programme.title: Inspector Coliandro: Run, Coliandro, Run
programme.desc: Coliandro responds to the mysterious phone call of a sensual female voice that tells him that there is a bomb ready to explode if he - and only he - will not run to defuse it. But the bomb ready to explode is not the only one.

programme.title: International Falls
programme.desc: Dee is a middle-aged mother of two who is stuck in a Midwest rut. While on vacation, she meets Tim, a washed-up stand-up comedian, and an unlikely bond develops. Together, they find the silver lining in their gloomy lives.

programme.title: Strike
programme.desc: In this fictionalised biopic, Agnieszka is an aging, single mother working on the shipyards. When she is fired on unjust grounds, she fights back at the system and her actions soon inspire the first non-communist trade union revolt in Eastern Europe.

programme.title: Cryptid Hunter
programme.desc: A mockumentary about a passionate monster enthusiast’s search for elusive cryptids like ‘Bigfoot‘ or ‘Nessie‘. However, no matter how hard he tries to find them, he never seems to be able to spot any, even if they were right in front of his very eyes.

programme.title: Lily!
programme.desc: Grandmother Nia has Alzheimer's disease. She can't remember and process her environment well. Grandmother Nia can’t even remember her own family. Her granddaughter Lily made a origami crane hoping that her grandmother could recover from her illness.

programme.title: The Furlough
programme.desc: Four inmates with vastly different convictions are granted a 48 hours furlough. Some seek to redeem failed relationships while others search for vengeance. But above it all, each of them seeks to reclaim their dignity and lust for life once again.

programme.title: Let Me Go
programme.desc: Based on a true story, Helga Schenider’s mother joined the Nazi SS in 1941 and abandoned her little daughter. In 2000, Helga’s family located her in a nursing home but the trauma and scars of the cruel past return to haunt the three generations of women.

programme.title: Midnight Runner
programme.desc: A true story. Jonas is one of the top runners in Switzerland. He is also a talented chef and plans to move in with Simone. But Jonas is increasingly tormented by dreams of his late brother. He begins to lead a tragic double life to overcome his despair.

programme.title: Her Job
programme.desc: In this slow-burning film about sexism and female emancipation, Panayiota is an illiterate housewife who gets her first job as a cleaner. Over time, she rises up the ranks and gains her family respect; but danger looms as a series of layoffs start.

programme.title: Arrow S1 13
programme.desc: Recently released from prison, Cyrus Vanch (DAVID ANDERS) returns to rule Starling City's underworld. But first he must take down his biggest opponent -- Arrow.

programme.title: Arrow S1 14
programme.desc: After Oliver is shot, he turns to Felicity for help. Together, she and Diggle team up to save Oliver's life -- as he hovers between life and death.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S12 17
programme.desc: While Penny and Bernadette are away at a pharmaceutical sales convention in San Diego, Sheldon, Leonard, Howard, Raj and Amy experiment on the Wolowitz kids.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S12 18
programme.desc: When competitors Pemberton and Campbell (SEAN ASTIN and KAL PENN) charm America on a publicity tour, Sheldon and Amy try to win over Nobel laureates.

programme.title: Container Wars S1 6
programme.desc: Always up for an outrageous gamble, Uzi and Schlomi throw down the gauntlet in the biggest auction yet. They win two amazing classic cars, but will a hidden surprise in the back of another container propel one of their rivals to an even bigger payday?

programme.title: Container Wars S2 1
programme.desc: The biggest auction on the planet explodes when a mysterious container from the Far East makes landfall in Los Angeles. Jason thinks he has the inside track, but will someone else unlock its secrets to land the biggest score yet?

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 5
programme.desc: Michael unearths a mutant turtle from a mystical Peruvian clay, a woman is blown away when 2 adorable bunnies become 8, and to top it off, a hapless carpenter becomes an accidental time traveler when a potent new glue has him coming undone.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 06
programme.desc: A miraculous liquid gives Michael the Midas touch in an eyeglass store. And later, Michael trains the new girl at a tanning salon, but things take a horrifying turn when she believes she's killed her first customer.

programme.title: The Mentalist S7 10
programme.desc: Jane takes extreme measures as the FBI team tries to apprehend a deadly gang of armored car robbers before their desperation to remain free costs more innocent people their lives.

programme.title: The Flash S8 10

programme.desc: A series of fire drills leads Veronica to the discovery that Neptune High has been receiving bomb threats. She enlists Wallace and Mac's (recurring guest star TINA MAJORINO) help to investigate classmates who could pose a serious threat to the school, including new student Ben (JONATHAN TAYLOR THOMAS - "Home Improvement," "Smallville"). Meanwhile, Keith stuns Veronica with the news of whom he's been secretly dating. Later, Duncan confronts Veronica about her ongoing investigation into hissister's death. JOEY LAUREN ADAMS ("Chasing Amy") guest stars as Ms. Stafford, a new substitute journalism teacher.

programme.desc: While helping a classmate search for her missing terrier, Veronica stumbles onto a bigger mystery, which affects pets all over Neptune, California. Meanwhile, tensions mount in the Echolls family as Trina (recurring guest star ALYSON HANNIGAN) tries to convince the now retired Aaron (recurring guest star HARRY HAMLIN) to accept a role in her new boyfriend's independent movie. Later, Weevil is arrested for breaking into the Kane residence and stealing something from the deceased Lilly's room.

programme.title: Veronica Mars S1 20
programme.desc: When a classmate's boyfriend threatens to post a humiliating video of his girlfriend online if she breaks up with him, Veronica helps her concoct a vengeful scheme if he doesn't allow the relationship to end peacefully. Meanwhile, Keith searches for Duncan after his parents post a huge reward for information on his whereabouts. Later, as her secret new relationship intensifies, Veronica learns a disturbing fact about the night that she was drugged and assaulted. Recurring guest star HARRY HAMLIN appears as Aaron Echolls, and recurring guest star TINA MAJORINO portrays Mac.

programme.desc: I’m Different Now - Kureno watches a copy of the Cinderella-ish play which Tohru prepared, hoping that he will realize Arisa’s feelings for him.

programme.title: Food Factory S3 Ep15
programme.desc: See the mass production of curly fries, plus red velvet cakes with cream cheese frosting, vegetable pot pies, and marshmallow squares covered in vanilla caramel.

programme.title: Food Factory S3 Ep16
programme.desc: Fish fingers are covered with batter and bread crumbs; puffed corn meal is coated with caramel; creating crinkle-cut sweet potato fries; and cookie dough batter is frozen, then smothered in chocolate.

programme.title: Food Factory S3 Ep18

programme.title: Chasing Monsters S3 Ep4
programme.desc: Piranha Attack - Mysterious disappearances, brutal attacks, and wounded people leaving trails of blood... Could the piranha, with its razor-sharp teeth, reputation as a true man-eater and ruthless predator, really be responsible?

programme.title: Life Below Zero: Canada S2 Ep7
programme.desc: Cold Harvest - Jon and his brother Lee search a vast expanse of tundra - on the hunt for a herd of muskox; Kim and Pierre head deep into the bush in an all-out effort to expand their Yukon trapline; Becky heads into the wilderness.

programme.title: North America with Simon Reeve S1 Ep5
programme.desc: In Belize, Simon dives on a coral reef off, visits a rescue centre for orphaned manatees and witnesses a gun battle between armed park rangers and intruders from neighbouring Guatemala intent on clearing the rainforest for farming.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 1 - Bahamas Ep3
programme.desc: The islands of the Bahamas are ringed with lush coral, underground cave systems, and plunging barrier reefs. Beyond the white sands and turquoise water, marine life abounds: agile reef sharks, large whitetip sharks, manatees, sea turtles, and wild dolphins.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 - Creature Comforts Ep5
programme.desc: This episode of Amazing Animal Friends features a troop of rescue center monkeys that have adopted a litter of stray kittens, a loyal dog helping a rescued raccoon overcome her fears, and an emu raised by Irish setters.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Wombat 1 - Joey's Journey Ep2
programme.desc: Wombats are solitary, slow-moving creatures, but breeding time brings out their energy, aggression and lots of play. Meet a southern hairy-nosed wombat named Birri, who’s trying to find a mate, along with a female named Winnie and her joey, Fred.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 - Short Grass Plains Ep1
programme.desc: The Serengeti plains echo the sound of two million wildebeest. Over the course of the year, the giant herd migrates from the north to the south and back again in an endless circle. Watch the most treacherous part of the migration—the crossing of the Mara River.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 - Return to the Mara Ep2
programme.desc: Wildlife expert and Safari guide Jean Du Plessis is in the south of the Serengeti plains to witness the largest mass birth on the planet. Every year on the short grass plains, the wildebeest migration stops for weeks while the females give birth. Then the entire herd begins to move again, heading back north towards the Mara River, where crocodiles lie in wait for an annual feast.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 1 - Stinkers Ep1
programme.desc: In nature, the right stench can mean the difference between life or death. Meet nature's odor-equipped inhabitants, from vomiting grasshoppers to dung-flinging hippos, and even a flower that's adapted to smell like death.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed 1 - Monkey Garden Ep1
programme.desc: At the southern edge of the Pantanal, the world’s largest tropical wetland on Earth, there’s a placelike no other, and a wildlife so diverse scientists scramble to understand the variety of ways animals interact with each other. The highlands of the Bodoquena Hills are the entrance to the murky wetlands of the Pantanal. Here, the waters are crystal clear, filtered by a limestone formation over 600 million year old, that offers a clear window into the life of these streams. Waterfalls, tufa dams, caves and pristine rivers with a visibility of up to fifty meters abound.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 1 - Socorro Islands Ep2
programme.desc: A wild and remote chain 400 kilometres south of Cabo San Lucas in the eastern Pacific, the Socorro Islands have been called the Mexican Galapagos. They're known for jaw-dropping encounters with giant Pacific manta rays, hammerhead schools, dolphins, and tiger sharks.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 1 - Bahamas Ep3
programme.desc: The islands of the Bahamas are ringed with lush coral, underground cave systems, and plunging barrier reefs. Beyond the white sands and turquoise water, marine life abounds: agile reef sharks, large whitetip sharks, manatees, sea turtles, and wild dolphins.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 - Zanzibar's Poison Monkey Ep8
programme.desc: Off the coast of Tanzania, baby Kima lives with his family of red Colobus monkeys. But what happens when he loses his way? Discover how this little monkey learns to adapt to life in the jungle—and find out if he can reconnect with his family again.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 1 - Winged Weirdos Ep2
programme.desc: One uses a mustache to attract mates and another has a bill so big, it needs special vertebrae to carry it. Learn how nature's flying iconoclasts have evolved their appearance in order to survive.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 1 - Socorro Islands Ep2
programme.desc: A wild and remote chain 400 kilometres south of Cabo San Lucas in the eastern Pacific, the Socorro Islands have been called the Mexican Galapagos. They're known for jaw-dropping encounters with giant Pacific manta rays, hammerhead schools, dolphins, and tiger sharks.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 1 - Ugly Ep3
programme.desc: Gawk at some of the world’s ugliest animals who owe their survival to the adaptations that made them so strange. A pudgy wolf eel, naked mole rat, and hideous sea lamprey may be superficially grotesque, but they’re evolutionarily amazing.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 1 - Creepy Crawlers Ep4
programme.desc: Witness the tiny creatures that make us squirm while hiding admirable survival skills. From playing dead, removing a tail, or being able to lift objects 30 times their weight, these insects conquer the world with their amazing adaptations.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed 1 - Bird Paradise Ep2
programme.desc: Every year, the southern wetlands of the Pantanal become a bird paradise as over 650 species of rare and iconic birds congregate here for the breeding season.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 2 - Iceland: Fire Ep1
programme.desc: Learn about the world’s largest volcanic island, a lone and rugged place where steam escapes, water explodes, and new ground is born every day. See how fire and ice collide in a battle that makes this the most geologically powerful island on earth.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 - To the Rescue Ep6
programme.desc: Meet more Amazing Animal Friends, including “ranch manager” Barclay, a Great Dane who happens to be a gifted horse whisperer. In Africa, a tiny marmoset called Thor has become obsessed with two young rescued mongooses.

programme.title: Weird, Wild & Wonderful
programme.desc: Trek across Africa for a peek at the colorful, quirky survival strategies of its animals. See these furry, feathered, and scaled magicians, from flamboyant flamingos to vanishing lizards, find food, elude predators, and find mates against all odds.

programme.title: The Accidental Wilderness: Europe's Everglades
programme.desc: Marvel at the stunning conversion of a bleak waste-water dumping ground into a paradise for Europe’s birds. Travel to western Germany for an intimate look at this reclamation success story, and see the thriving animal communities that live there.

programme.title: After the Wildfires
programme.desc: Charting the long-term recovery of wildlife in the aftermath of Australia’s catastrophic bushfires through stories of hope, human intervention and resilience, this film provides an urgent message to safeguard our environment before it is too late.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 1 - Ugly Ep3

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 - To the Rescue Ep6
programme.desc: Meet more Amazing Animal Friends, including “ranch manager” Barclay, a Great Dane who happens to be a gifted horse whisperer. In Africa, a tiny marmoset called Thor has become obsessed with two young rescued mongooses.

programme.title: Weird, Wild & Wonderful
programme.desc: Trek across Africa for a peek at the colorful, quirky survival strategies of its animals. See these furry, feathered, and scaled magicians, from flamboyant flamingos to vanishing lizards, find food, elude predators, and find mates against all odds.

programme.title: The Accidental Wilderness: Europe's Everglades
programme.desc: Marvel at the stunning conversion of a bleak waste-water dumping ground into a paradise for Europe’s birds. Travel to western Germany for an intimate look at this reclamation success story, and see the thriving animal communities that live there.

programme.title: After the Wildfires
programme.desc: Charting the long-term recovery of wildlife in the aftermath of Australia’s catastrophic bushfires through stories of hope, human intervention and resilience, this film provides an urgent message to safeguard our environment before it is too late.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed 1 - Bird Paradise Ep2
programme.desc: Every year, the southern wetlands of the Pantanal become a bird paradise as over 650 species of rare and iconic birds congregate here for the breeding season.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 2 - Iceland: Fire Ep1
programme.desc: Learn about the world’s largest volcanic island, a lone and rugged place where steam escapes, water explodes, and new ground is born every day. See how fire and ice collide in a battle that makes this the most geologically powerful island on earth.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 1 - Creepy Crawlers Ep4
programme.desc: Witness the tiny creatures that make us squirm while hiding admirable survival skills. From playing dead, removing a tail, or being able to lift objects 30 times their weight, these insects conquer the world with their amazing adaptations.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 - Short Grass Plains Ep1
programme.desc: The Serengeti plains echo the sound of two million wildebeest. Over the course of the year, the giant herd migrates from the north to the south and back again in an endless circle. Watch the most treacherous part of the migration—the crossing of the Mara River.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 - Return to the Mara Ep2
programme.desc: Wildlife expert and Safari guide Jean Du Plessis is in the south of the Serengeti plains to witness the largest mass birth on the planet. Every year on the short grass plains, the wildebeest migration stops for weeks while the females give birth. Then the entire herd begins to move again, heading back north towards the Mara River, where crocodiles lie in wait for an annual feast.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 - To the Rescue Ep6
programme.desc: Meet more Amazing Animal Friends, including “ranch manager” Barclay, a Great Dane who happens to be a gifted horse whisperer. In Africa, a tiny marmoset called Thor has become obsessed with two young rescued mongooses.

programme.title: Weird, Wild & Wonderful
programme.desc: Trek across Africa for a peek at the colorful, quirky survival strategies of its animals. See these furry, feathered, and scaled magicians, from flamboyant flamingos to vanishing lizards, find food, elude predators, and find mates against all odds.

programme.title: The Accidental Wilderness: Europe's Everglades
programme.desc: Marvel at the stunning conversion of a bleak waste-water dumping ground into a paradise for Europe’s birds. Travel to western Germany for an intimate look at this reclamation success story, and see the thriving animal communities that live there.

programme.title: After the Wildfires
programme.desc: Charting the long-term recovery of wildlife in the aftermath of Australia’s catastrophic bushfires through stories of hope, human intervention and resilience, this film provides an urgent message to safeguard our environment before it is too late.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 1 - Identity Crisis Ep5
programme.desc: Are they guinea pigs, beavers, or something else? Capybaras embody the features of several different animals at once, as do warthogs, anteaters, and other fascinating genetic hybrids. Learn why these wannabes display such particular physical traits.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 1 - Tricksters Ep6
programme.desc: The animal kingdom is filled with mimicry, transformation, and trickery. Discover how stick bugs, lion fish, emperor scorpions, and chameleons use camouflage and confusion to deceive.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 - Kgalagadi Transfrontier Park Ep5
programme.desc: In the southern reaches of Africa’s great Kalahari basin, everything is made tough. Ancient rivers harbor water deep underground, and these hidden lifelines forge a fragile link to survival. This is the Kgalagadi Transfrontier Park.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons 1 - The Waterberg - Mountains of Life Ep1
programme.desc: In the Limpopo region of South Africa lies an ancient land. From rolling grasslands to rocky gorges, wildlife has learnt to make the most of what’s on offer. This is the Waterberg, a land of plenty.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons 1 - Vrederfort Dome - Crater of Life Ep2
programme.desc: In this programme we look at the Vredefort Crater in South Africa and the life it supports. From rocky outcrops to grassland, and from wetlands to mighty rivers, each habitat provides a niche for a host of creatures.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons 1 - Africa's Great Oasis - the Okavango Ep3
programme.desc: Trapped in one of Africa’s great deserts is a lush, hidden world. It is an untamed wilderness unlike any other on Earth. Fed by a mighty river that travels from distant mountains, it is a vast mosaic of life, which pulsates with vivid beauty.

programme.title: In for the Kill
programme.desc: It’s one of the most dramatic events in the natural world. When a predator goes In For the Kill prey scatters, dust flies, and claws and teeth draw red. But how do nature’s killing machines pull off these epic feats of speed, cunning and agility? Some use stealth to hide in plain sight. Camouflaged markings and hidden tunnels give some predators the opportunity to deliver their lethal strike. Evolution has created insects that mimic leaves, burrowing spiders ready to pounce, and an owl so silent engineers are turning to it for inspiration. Rather than wait for their prey to come to them, other predators reel them in with a lure. But to understand the origins of luring, brand new scientific research must be examined. From lions on the African savanna to pelicans in the wetlands of Australia, teamwork can be found in almost every branch of the natural world, but surprising discoveries are still being made. Over millions of years, predators have perfected countless ways to trick, ambush and overcome their prey. Necessity is the mother of invention, and when it comes to killing, the animal kingdom has it all.

programme.title: Wild Crusades 1 - The Monkey Diaries Ep3
programme.desc: Hidden in the jungles of Sri Lanka is the toque macaque. Endemic to the island, these feisty group-living monkeys are found nowhere else on earth. And they are at the heart of the longest primate research project ever undertaken. Dr Wolfgang Dittus is on a quest to understand their complex society.

programme.title: A Bee's Diary
programme.desc: In a beehive, tens of thousands of tiny animals work toward a common goal: the survival of the colony. But what is life like for an individual honeybee? A Bee’s Diary tells that story.

programme.title: Osprey: Sea Raptor
programme.desc: A veteran pair of osprey return home to a Connecticut saltmarsh. Over one summer they must battle their enemies, withstand the elements, and hunt hundreds and hundreds of fish, all to raise the next generation of sea raptors.

programme.title: Stormborn 1 - Return of the Light Ep2
programme.desc: Arctic foxes raise cubs on Iceland’s volcanic shores. Finding food proves challenging until one fox learns to hunt new prey. In Shetland the otter cub strikes out alone and his mother finds a new mate. In Norway reindeer calves take their first steps.

programme.title: Stormborn 1 - Children of the Storm Ep3
programme.desc: In Iceland only one out of six cubs has survived. Abandoned by her parents, she now has to fend for herself. The reindeer herd swim two miles across open water. In Scotland, 35,000 grey seals arrive for their annual breeding season.

programme.desc: The Magic Of Ireland - Jack Maxwell explores the magic of Ireland through its stories, people and drinks.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters S6 Ep3
programme.desc: Attics And Art - Salvage supremo Drew Pritchard visits a 400-year-old manor house and discovers a beautiful, forgotten treasure in a dusty attic.

programme.title: The Holzer Files S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Death To Tyrants - The team reopens the file on the Surratt Tavern, where John Wilkes Booth hid after fatally shooting Abraham Lincoln in 1865.

programme.title: Railroad Alaska S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Frozen Danger - Off-grid settlers Jim, Nancy and John face being stranded without basic necessities when an avalanche hits and blocks the track.

programme.title: Everest Air S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Life In The Balance At 18,000 Feet - Jeff Evans and the ARS team rescue a climber facing cardiac issues and a trekker with brain trauma.

programme.title: Beyond The Unknown S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Annabelle The Doll, Salem's Curse And Alien Abduction - Don Wildman investigates a sinister rag doll, a deadly curse and the Salter UFO abduction.

programme.title: Luxury Uncovered S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Ritz Carlton Hotel, Moscow, Russia - Jenny travels to Red Square in Moscow to see how one of the the most iconic hotel names in the world provide service and a great guest experience.

programme.title: Luxury Uncovered S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Oceana Beach Reserve - Jenny will start with a trip out with the rangers,tending to animals like rhino and springbok,looking after the watering holes and guiding guests as a ranger.

programme.title: The Alaska Triangle S2 Ep1
programme.desc: The Dark Pyramid And Violent Nature - A top-secret government facility beneath the Alaskan wilderness may be hiding an extraterrestrial pyramid.

programme.title: Living Alaska S4 Ep13
programme.desc: North Pole Pursuit - A Washington, DC, family wants the full Alaska experience in small-town North Pole.

programme.title: Living Alaska S4 Ep1
programme.desc: Old Familiar Frontier - A family of five moves from England to Anchorage, AK, hoping to find a home with a rustic look that's near good schools.

programme.title: World's Greatest Motorcycle Rides S8 Ep1
programme.desc: Australia Part 1 - Henry Cole climbs aboard his Harley Davidson Street Glide to brave the Friday night Sydney rush hour traffic and head 520 miles to Melbourne.

programme.title: Expedition To The Edge S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Sink Or Swim - A crew departs the Marshall Islands to set the northern-most sailing record and complete the perilous Northwestern Passage through the Arctic.

programme.title: Alaskan Killer Bigfoot S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Village Of The Damned - After bidding their loved ones farewell, the team arrives in Portlock by boat, and they immediately feel a sense of foreboding in the deserted fishing village.

programme.title: Hawaii Life S11 Ep13
programme.desc: Fishing For A New Life On Maui - Tod wants to leave California for a slower pace of life on Maui. He hopes to find a move-in ready condo with an updated kitchen and a pool.

programme.title: Hawaii Life S11 Ep1
programme.desc: Finding Inspiration On Kauai - A couple follows their dream of moving to Hawaii and settles on Kauai. They hope to find a condo with beach access where they can live in luxury.

programme.title: The Dead Files S13 Ep7
programme.desc: Marked For Death - A vicious, man-hating spirit turns a couple's dream home into a nightmare in Glendale, Arizona.

programme.title: Fright Club S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Screamfilled Donuts - The guys freak out over footage of a haunted donut shop, a dad trying to protect his family from a ghostly intruder and a jealous entity terrorising a couple.

programme.title: True Nightmares: Tales Of Terror S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Hate The Game - A sideshow performer is gunned down and everyone in his family is a suspect, and a beloved singer in a church choir is resurrected from the dead.

programme.title: True Nightmares: Tales Of Terror S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Trick Or Treat - After a family goes trick-or-treating on Halloween night, they rush their young son to the hospital, where he dies from unknown causes.

programme.title: Living Alaska S4 Ep13
programme.desc: North Pole Pursuit - A Washington, DC, family wants the full Alaska experience in small-town North Pole.

programme.desc: Old Familiar Frontier - A family of five moves from England to Anchorage, AK, hoping to find a home with a rustic look that's near good schools.

programme.title: The Alaska Triangle S2 Ep1
programme.desc: The Dark Pyramid And Violent Nature - A top-secret government facility beneath the Alaskan wilderness may be hiding an extraterrestrial pyramid.

programme.title: Grave Mysteries S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Texts And Threats - Soon after a bitter social media war with his ex and her new man, Seath Jackson disappears. Detectives uncover if this is a runaway case or something more serious.

programme.title: Hawaii Life S11 Ep13
programme.desc: Fishing For A New Life On Maui - Tod wants to leave California for a slower pace of life on Maui. He hopes to find a move-in ready condo with an updated kitchen and a pool.

programme.title: Aliens In Alaska S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Night Stalkers - An extraterrestrial stalker leaves a family frozen in fear outside of Juneau, Alaska.

programme.title: Bahamas Life S2 Ep3

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep33

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep19
programme.desc: The Swiss Mess - The Wanderers head to Switzerland to get some chocolate for Whitebeard’s chocolate fondue fountain. In Switzerland they find Odlulu using the Vacuum Key to steal all the country's chocolate so she can win The Colossal Festival of Chocolate.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep33
programme.desc: Cats! The Planet / Selfie-Ish - When Pig is abducted by a cat-lady-alien, Tip and Oh must travel to a cat-planet to save him; After Tip becomes a social media star, Tip gets addicted to "the likes," risking Oh's life in the process

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep19
programme.desc: Xerx Works - On a mission to destroy the factory that manufactures Octavian’s Xerx warriors, Cleo and Pharaoh Yosira butt heads over who’s in charge and Mihos masquerades as a cabbage.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep14
programme.desc: Gypsy Moth Prophecies / Skidzo-Brainia - A fortune-telling moth forecasts doom for Whiplash and though Whip is skeptical, the crew tries to keep him safe so the it doesn't come true. // Skidmark learns the crew is tired of his crazy behavior so he invents a helmet that changes his personality in unpredictable ways.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep26
programme.desc: Big Fun Town / New Crackridge - Archibald and Bea plan another couple's long overdue honeymoon. Is a tornado coming to Crackridge? Archibald sure seems to think so.

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Sick Day - When the other dragons come down with the flu, Summer must overcome her fear of eels to retrieve the cure and get her friends back in the air.

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Screwtop Spudswap - Dennis will stop at nothing to prevent Pieface from failing Mrs Creecher's maths test! He persuades the gang to use Professor Von Screwtop's mind-swapping device. But in a disastrous turn of events, Screwtop is on the loose with the brain of Paul the potato and Pieface is left with a potato with the brain of Screwtop to help get him through the test!

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Are We There Yeti? - The gang go on an adventure in search of the Beanotown Yeti, but when the Yeti grabs JJ and makes a run for his cave, Dennis and his chums must come to the rescue!

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep59
programme.desc: The Iceman Melteth - A terrifying ice monster comes from the portal with a grudge against Puss in Boots, but when the sun proves too much for the water based beast, the San Lorenzans help in an unexpected way

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep7
programme.desc: He Blinded Me With Science - Julien teams up with Timo, the tenrec, a scientist who the King elists to automate everything in the kingdom.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free - Riding Academy Ep69
programme.desc: The Gavel Of Justice - Someone stole Bebe's gavel and used it to break a window at the academy! Everyone seems to suspect Alex ... but Pru is certain he's innocent.

programme.desc: Blank Day / Haircuffed - When Poppy finds out there’s a day on the Troll calendar with no existing holiday, as Queen she must help choose a new one./In an attempt to get Creek and Branch to stop arguing, Poppy braids their hair together, forcing them to learn to get along.

programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Costly Conundrum Of The Calamitous Claylossus - George and Harold transform the school's mysterious student into a giant clay monster who turns the entire town into clay

programme.desc: Night Of The Living Croods/Spoonful Of Soo-Gar - When The Croods experience the first-ever sugar-rush, they're hooked on the delicious new food; Grug is labeled a zombie after taking the first nap.
