programme.desc: Hero Effect / Vr The World - Fredo's filming a second movie -- and starring in it, too. But his bloated ego's too much to bear. Richie builds a game powered by RichCoins.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Rupert And The Cloud Shepherd - Rupert, Ping Pong, Bill and Ming help the Cloud Shepherd find some missing clouds that have sneaked away to play. But how can the friends get them back up into the sky?

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Rupert And The Magic Carpet - When Ming gets stuck up a tree, Rupert, Ping Pong and Bill try to rescue her but, thanks to Edward's mistakes, they all get stuck too. Can Edward overcome his fear of heights and save them?

programme.title: My Life Me Ep5
programme.desc: The Makeover - Liam starts acting even stranger when he falls in love with an older woman:15-year-old Cynthia. Birch, Sandra and Raffi conspire to give Liam a complete makeover to make him more appealing. Their plans backfire, making Liam look crazy instead of attractive.

programme.title: My Life Me Ep6
programme.desc: The Pom-Pom Girl - Sandra rises to the challenge of becoming a cheerleader, an act that stuns and mortifies her podmates. As Sandra succumbs to Amelia's ridiculous hazing rituals Pod 4 becomes increasingly uneasy. But we soon learn that Sandra is only doing back flips to ensure her nemesis' ultimate humiliation.

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep57
programme.desc: King Stingo - Aunt Tulip has lost Grubby again. When Stingo finds him, he asks to be made King as a reward. It isn't long before he has gone too far and the tots are all fed up with his demands. Can Fifi get life in the garden back to normal?

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep58
programme.desc: Hide And Seek - The tots are playing hide and seek and the winner will get Fifi's delicious jam tarts. Who will win, Stingo and Slugsy are sure it will be them!

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Escape From Azka-Bash - Dennis must escape detention and Bash Street School to make the Beanotown Brawny Bean Race before Walter wins it! With the help of a note placed in his desk, he must sneak past Mrs Creecher and make a run for it – unless the mysterious note giver stops him first!

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Griller Thriller - Dennis’ ultimate hero, Grizzly Griller, plans on trekking to the source of the River Beano, broadcasting the treacherous path on live TV. Dennis introduces him to his pet hamster, Galahad – only to discover they are his biggest fear! Grizzly is so torn up that Dennis must disguise himself as his hero and go in his place!

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep3
programme.desc: Defenders Of The Universe - The Castle is attacked by an alien battle cruiser. The new Paladins must form Voltron for the first time in 10,000 years.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep31
programme.desc: Brain Switch / Koikawa Harumachi - When Peabody uses a brain-switching machine to let Sherman find out what it's like to be grown up, Sherman likes it so much he refuses to switch back

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep29
programme.desc: Flynt - Ty gets jealous when a Hydrodon named Flynt becomes everyone's new hero, but when a blazing fire heads towards the ravine, Ty must ask Flynt for help

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Bad Egg - Magnus hatches a plan to hide in an egg to spy on the Rescue Riders. But things get all scrambled when a mama dragon takes him to her nest.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep8
programme.desc: Surf N Turf / Hardcase Returns - The snails' relaxing day at the beach is threatened when the sewer surfing roaches challenge them to a surfing contest. // Hardcase returns and threatens to take revenge on, so the crew becomes his bodyguards and takes the job a little too seriously.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep8
programme.desc: Crushing It - As a Rumblehorn wreaks havoc on Dragon's Edge, Hiccup seeks the help of Stoick – who forms an unexpected bond with the rampaging beast.

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S2 Ep31
programme.desc: Lights, Camera, Org Chart! - Boss Baby creates an org chart to cement his leadership as the Boss of the playgroup babies. However when Bubbeezee photographer Travis Le Duque chooses anyone but Boss for his coverspread;the status quo is upended! Tim continues to fail his class assignment: a model solar system

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep8
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Jarring Jerkiness Of The Judge J.O.R.T.S - George and Harold transform their new Spanish teacher into a superhero after they feel guilty for pranking him, but their teacher loves it and gets carried away

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free - Riding Academy Ep70
programme.desc: The Rival Racer - A swift new recruit joins the school racing team, putting Lucky's dreams of riding out front in jeopardy. Pru and Abigail clash over a class project.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On Ep8
programme.desc: Eye'Ll Be Watching You / Sorry Not Sorry - Convinced Troll Village is dangerous Branch makes a security plantPoppy creates an apology monster out of Gristle when teaching him how to make amends.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep10
programme.desc: Patch Games/ Mark Twain - Sherman's scout troop, the Laser Robot Tiger Troopers, earn their merit badges on the show; Mark Twain's gift for gab wins back his lucky typewriter.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Baritone Tea Part 1 / Baritone Tea Part 2 - Uh, oh — Archibald accidentally drinks all of Finly's vocal-enhancing tea on the eve of his brother's big concert!

programme.title: Secrets Of The Songwing Ep1
programme.desc: Secrets Of The Songwing - The Rescue Riders race to save Aggro after she falls under a spell from a unique dragon with a musical call that traps anyone who hears it - and makes them sing.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep15
programme.desc: The Case Of The Blue Wall - Everyone is going to play Hide and Seek in Brickabuild but Fuse stops the game because someone has painted the big wall outside his workshop blue! What if they do it again? Or if they decide to paint the rest of Brickabuild? Noddy uses all his investigating skills of who, what, where, when, why and how to work out that the wall must have been painted by someone very tall who likes the colour blue. Smartysaurus! She admits she painted it so that she could be better at hide-and-seek! Noddy helps her to understand that she can play the game without having to cheat. Thank you Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep16
programme.desc: The Case Of The Fable Forest Gold - The Pirates are searching for the long-lost Fable Forest Gold. If they can't find it they might have to stop being pirates for good! Noddy leaps into action to help them. Using all his investigating skills, asking who, what, where, when, why and how and with the help of the wwwbook Noddy follows the clues and finds the gold! Now the pirates can stay in Toyland and hunt for treasure forever! Hurrah for Noddy!

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep15
programme.desc: Where'S My Puddle Gone? - Jess wants the puppies to come Puddle Jumping with him. There were lots of puddles the day before but when they get to the spot, the puddle's GONE! Jess goes searching - has someone taken it? Borrowed it? No, he works out that the water's gone back up in to the clouds.

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep16
programme.desc: Why Has My Shadow Gone Away? - Jess has s new friend - Horace tells him it's his shadow. Jess is keen to introduce him to all his friends, but he keeps running away! Jess works out that the sun has to be shining for the shadow to come back and that all the friends have their Own shadows to play games with too.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep34
programme.desc: Cementasaurs - Ty is pushed into a quicksand-like pool of wet cement by the wild Cementasaurs, and it's up to the Reptoolsto quickly rescue him before he sinks

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep20
programme.desc: A Wanderer'S Christmas - Odlulu wants to get off the naughty list so she goes around the world and tries to "help" celebrations. Unfortunately she does the opposite which means Waldo and Wenda need to clean up her mess to reinstate Christmas!

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep34
programme.desc: Newbeings On The Block / Juicy Gossip - When an alien moves into the apartment above them, Oh thinks he's a threat to earth but nobody believes him; Oh befriends the Busy Bodies on Lucy's behalf

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep20
programme.desc: Parasites - Mihos has some parasites making him sick, and Cleo and the rest have to shrink down tiny to cure him. This one turns out weirder than you’re expecting.

However, his genius plan comes to a sticky end, when Pieface begins to think that with Paul at his side, he is completely invincible!

Dennis can't understand why Gnasher has turned against him and has to use all his heartfelt pleas and happy memories to try and win Gnasher back!

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep11

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep60
programme.desc: Swine And Roses - It's Lord Crispintine's Day, and Toby is set on Cleevil as his Crispintine, but after a gang of imps from the portal teach Toby to be a real “bad boy,” he learns of their true plans

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep34
programme.desc: Marshtato Fairy / Do The Biggie - On the foggiest night of the year, the Marshtato Fairy magically delivers marshtatos to Troll Village, which every Troll loves and celebrates- except for Branch, who doesn’t think the Marshtato Fairy exists. When Poppy encourages him to believe, Branch set out to prove Poppy wrong. /When Biggie accidentally invents a dance craze, he realizes how much he enjoys being the center of attention. programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever S2 Ep43

programme.desc: Rupert And The Cheeky Sneeze - When one of Rupert's sneezes escapes the friends have to find it a home in the forest.

programme.title: My Life Me Ep7

However, Raffi's current obsession with texting has him including his own acronyms in his answers, thus creating irrefutable evidence for the teacher. Guilt finally undoes the pod with unlikely results.

A startling last-minute revelation keeps the pod from blowing apart.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S1 Ep122
programme.desc: Pups Save the Camping Trip / Pups and the Trouble with Turtles - Skye and Rocky go on their first camping trip, but when Chickaletta gets caught in a crevice, they have to call in the PAW Patrol. // Tons of baby turtles start to pop up all over town and it’s up to Ryder and the Pups to get them back to their pond.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep122
programme.desc: Paddington Builds Scarecrow / Paddington Plays Hide and Seek - Paddington accidentally ruins Mr. Browns lovely lawn and must repair it. But the birds take a liking to the seeds so he builds a Scarecrow. // Mrs. Bird is a champion hide and seeker but where is she? Paddington, Jonathan and Judy mus go find her.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep511
programme.desc: Pedro the Cowboy - Pedro Pony pretends he is a proper cowboy, telling everyone stories in the camp he has set up in the garden.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep512
programme.desc: Peppa and George's Garden - Grandpa Pig pops round with some seeds for Peppa and George. Daddy Pig helps out by being a scarecrow

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep513
programme.desc: The Flying Vet - Doctor Hamster is rushed off her feet when nearly all the animals need her help on the same day.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep133
programme.desc: Froga's Choice - Froga can't decide which boots to wear for today's group photo with her friends. Anna, Ron, and Bubu try to help her decide, but it makes her decision-making more difficult!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep134
programme.desc: The Great Friendship Show - Anna and her friends write a poem. Bubu prefers to paint. And the friends do so too. Froga is not so keen on painting, she creates a full-on choreography that Christopher finds hard, he prefers juggling. For Ron, it's poetry.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S3 Ep302
programme.desc: Blue's Dino Clues - It's a prehistoric game of Blue's Clues when a mysterious dinosaur egg falls out of the skidoo frame and starts to hatch! We figure out what kind of dinosaur is inside the egg so we can reunite the egg with their family.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) Ep114
programme.desc: Crazy Golf - Laa-Laa shows Tinky Winky how to play crazy golf. Tinky Winky loves hitting the ball which travels up and down the hills of Teletubbyland and in to the Tiddlytubbies.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S1) Ep19
programme.desc: Car - Dee encourages a friend to say car and we go on a whirlwind word adventure.

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep53

programme.desc: It's time to find a dinosaur - After playing with her toy dinosaurs, JoJo decides she would love to see a real one. Gran Gran takes JoJo to the museum to see a fossilised skeleton of a Tyrannosaurus rex!

programme.desc: Ugli Fruit - Monty and Stan refuse to taste a strange-looking fruit, but Monty soon realises that you shouldn't judge a book by its cover.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep42

programme.desc: The Breakfast Badge - Tag's feeling grumpy because he didn't eat his breakfast, uh-oh! Luckily Duggee has his Breakfast Badge, and soon the Squirrels will too.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Karma Chameleon / Team Effort - The Changs go on vacation, leaving Ronnie Anne and her cousins to look after Cam, the chameleon snake. // Ronnie Anne and her skate buddies work together to show their coach they can make a good team.

programme.title: It's Pony S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Cat Alley / Saving Horse - Annie tries to take a shortcut through an alley, but soon discovers that Pony's scared of the cats who live there. // When a vandalizer threatens Pony's favorite sculpture, Annie and Pony must find a way to stop her.

programme.title: LEGO City Adventures S01 Ep109
programme.desc: 3, 2, 1 / Paradoors - It's the day of the big rocket launch, and the entire city has Mars-launch fever! // Astronauts reach Mars orbit and prepare to launch their probes, but Tippy Doorman has other plans.

programme.title: LEGO City Adventures S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Slam the Door / JAILBREAK! - Harl attempts to prevent Tippy from bringing the fabled 'Mars Door' back to Earth. // Tippy Dorman, faces the trial of the century after his attempt to take over the world.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep401
programme.desc: Bloodline - When the boys send Dave's DNA sample to a testing lab the results show he's related to Jack The Ripper!

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep402
programme.desc: Theodore's Calling - Miss Croner attempts to help Theodore discover his true calling in life.

programme.desc: Clumsy Jeanette - Jeanette is suddenly the clumsiest person on the planet. Is there something wrong with her, or her new glasses?

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep403
programme.desc: Adventures in Babysitting - Theodore gets roped into doing Alvin's babysitting sitting job with a spoiled four year old.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep171
programme.desc: Karen 2.0 / InSpongeiac - When Plankton replaces his computer wife Karen with the new, better Karen 2, the original Karen ends up working at the Krusty Krab. // SpongeBob can’t get to sleep, and asks for help from Patrick… who can’t stay awake.

programme.title: Danger Force S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Mika in the Middle - Mika gets a fine lesson on the art of not snitching, but a surprise from Schwoz's Mom might cause her to fail the test.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: Fairly Odder S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Cake, Dance, & Solid Gold Pants - Timmy Turner is excited to gift his cousin Vivian his Fairy Godparents on her first day living in Dimmsdale. However, when her new stepbrother Roy accidentally witnesses the transfer, Viv and Roy are forced to share the fairy godparents.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep308
programme.desc: Perro Malo - Our sweet Lalo get switched with mischievous perrito Malo for the day and the Casagrandes need to get their pup back!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep306
programme.desc: 15 Candles - Already planning Ronnie Anne's quinceañera, Rosa decides to train Ronnie Anne - for the next 3 years!

programme.title: The Loud House S06 Ep608
programme.desc: Sofa, So Good - The kids search all over Royal Woods to find the missing furniture they left outside while cleaning.

programme.title: The Loud House S06 Ep608
programme.desc: Dine and Bash - After failing to make Chef Guy Grazer a meal on his show, the kids try to erase the footage before it airs.

programme.title: Star Trek: Prodigy S01 Ep109
programme.desc: A Moral Star, Part 1 - The crew forego their dreams of Starfleet to return to Tars Lamora in a no-win scenario.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep184
programme.desc: Jailbreak! / Evil Spatula - An imprisoned Plankton teams up with his fellow inmates to break out of jail and steal the Krabby Patty secret formula. // SpongeBob replaces his broken spatula with one from Plankton, which may or may not have magical powers.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep185
programme.desc: It Came From Goo Lagoon - A giant goo bubble emerges from Goo Lagoon and threatens all of Bikini Bottom--except for Plankton, who plans to use the bubble for his own evil ends.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Ariel Force One / Itsy Bitsy - When a hot air balloonist crash lands into the Steadfast, the Middlemost Post goes on a journey to help her fix it. // When Parker gives shelter to a spider during a blizzard on the mountain, the cloud learns of Angus's deathly spider fear.

programme.title: The Loud House S01 Ep111

programme.title: Inheritors
programme.desc: Inheritors is a multi-media product from CGTN that shines a light on China’s rich Intangible Cultural Heritage. Each 30-minute TV edition is hosted by a long-term expatriate in China who has a unique understanding of the country’s culture. He or she will introduce viewers to people who are dedicating their lives to its protection, inheritance, innovation, development and promotion.

programme.title: Jom Masak Musim Pertama Ep12
programme.desc: Pemain-pemain bola sepak tempatan menunjukkan kemahiran memasak mereka dan berkongsi pengalaman serta aksi memasak yang pasti mencuit hati. Rancangan ini dapat memberi Inspirasi kepada peminat yang menonton

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep26
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: Road To UFC Ep2
programme.desc: ROAD TO UFC is a ground-breaking “win and advance” tournament that gives top MMA prospects from Asia a pathway to a UFC contract. Eight mixed martial arts athletes will compete in each of four men’s weight classes: flyweight, bantamweight, featherweight and lightweight. The opening round is divided into four episodes, each of which includes four tournament bouts and one additional non-tournament bout. These non-tournament bouts are included for promising prospects whose divisions might not have been included in ROAD TO UFC.
